title: Huge Downstairs 1 Bedroom 1 Bath!!! Pre-lease Today, Will Not Last
posting_body: ['Comfort & Style', "Live better at The Promenade at Hunter's Glen Apartments for Rent in Thornton, Colorado.", "Indulged by a pristine community greenbelt and overlooking Hunter's Glen Lake... there is no other place to call home!", 'Striking finishes, renovated cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, ceiling fans, storage, central air conditioning, gas heat, fireplaces in select homes and spacious nine foot ceilings give you all the comforts of home, the pleasures of a resort and the appeal of the Thornton community.', 'Work hard.', 'Play harder.', "The Promenade at Hunter's Glen is a pet-friendly community gives you the most out of your day with restaurants, parks, golfing and shopping within minutes away!", 'Make time to unwind in the hot tub, year round swimming pool, work out in the fitness room or play a game of volleyball in our sand volleyball court.', 'Enjoy the breathtaking views from your private balcony or patio.', "At The Promenade at Hunter's Glen, you are surrounded by life's many pleasures!", 'We invite you to preview our community by viewing our photo gallery and features of our community.', 'Schedule a personalized tour of our apartments by calling', 'show contact info', ", or stop by The Promenade at Hunter's Glen Apartments today and see why so many other people chose us as their place to call home!", 'We are close to work, close to play, close to perfect!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Use this link for more info:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 575 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Ceiling Fans*', '- Washer and Dryer in Unit', '- Vaulted Ceilings', '- Garden Soaking Tubs', '- View*', '- Fireplace*', '- Air Conditioning', '- Cable Ready', '- Oversized Closets', '- Balcony / Patio', '- Microwave', '- Dishwasher', '*Select units only', 'Community Amenities', '- Emergency Maintenance', '- Accepts Electronic Payments', '- Playground/Tot Lot', '- Business Center', '- Garages', '- Swimming Pool', '- Covered Parking Available', '- Clubhouse', '- Trail to Hike, Bike, Jog', '- Bark Park', '- Pet Friendly', '- Hot Tub', '- Fitness Center', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet-friendly, call for details.', 'Office Hours', 'Sunday:\tCLOSED', 'Monday:\t9:00 AM to 6:00 PM', 'Tuesday:\t9:00 AM to 6:00 PM', 'Wednesday:\t9:00 AM to 6:00 PM', 'Thursday: 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM', 'Friday:\t9:00 AM to 6:00 PM', 'Saturday:\t10:00 AM to 5:00 PM', "Promenade at Hunter's Glen", '12801 Lafayette Street, Thornton , CO, 80241', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'wI4MhcX5aRqM']
